mapper.sql: COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID as commodityContractId, OPERATOR_INFO_ID as operatorInfoId, COMMODITY_TYPE_ID as commodityTypeId, COMMODITY_CODE as commodityCode, SUBJECT_MATTER as subjectMatter, COMMODITY_NAME as commodityName, UNIT as unit, UNIT_EN as unitEn, STANDARD_UNIT_NAME as standardUnitName, STANDARD_UNIT_MULTIPLE as standardUnitMultiple, TRADE_UNIT_MULTIPLE as tradeUnitMultiple, STATUS as status, CREATE_TIME as createTime, MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime, EXPIRE_TIME as expireTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from COMMODITY_CONTRACT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into COMMODITY_CONTRACT (OPERATOR_INFO_ID, COMMODITY_TYPE_ID, COMMODITY_CODE, SUBJECT_MATTER, COMMODITY_NAME, UNIT, UNIT_EN, STANDARD_UNIT_NAME, STANDARD_UNIT_MULTIPLE, TRADE_UNIT_MULTIPLE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME) values (#{operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into COMMODITY_CONTRACT
OPERATOR_INFO_ID,
COMMODITY_TYPE_ID,

UNIT_EN,

EXPIRE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update COMMODITY_CONTRACT
COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{record.commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPERATOR_INFO_ID = #{record.operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_TYPE_ID = #{record.commodityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CODE = #{record.commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT_MATTER = #{record.subjectMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STANDARD_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{record.standardUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRADE_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{record.tradeUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update COMMODITY_CONTRACT set COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{record.commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OPERATOR_INFO_ID = #{record.operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_TYPE_ID = #{record.commodityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_CODE = #{record.commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_MATTER = #{record.subjectMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_NAME = #{record.commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_EN = #{record.unitEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_UNIT_NAME = #{record.standardUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{record.standardUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADE_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{record.tradeUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update COMMODITY_CONTRACT
OPERATOR_INFO_ID = #{operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_TYPE_ID = #{commodityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_CODE = #{commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT_MATTER = #{subjectMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_NAME = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update COMMODITY_CONTRACT set OPERATOR_INFO_ID = #{operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_TYPE_ID = #{commodityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_CODE = #{commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_MATTER = #{subjectMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_NAME = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_EN = #{unitEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_UNIT_NAME = #{standardUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{standardUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADE_UNIT_MULTIPLE = #{tradeUnitMultiple,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where COMMODITY_CONTRACT_ID = #{commodityContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
